maintext:
With Jesus' arrival at Christmas, so too a new liberation is come for those who choose to follow Him. But we may ask: from what exactly does He liberate us? Today's Gospel helps us to understand.Mass: St. Damasus I - Opt Mem1st: Is 35:1-10Resp: Ps 85:9-10, 11-12, 13-14Gsp: Lk 5:17-26Please like and share this video on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/90378558559/videos/10155906511558560

title: Dec 11 - Homily: He Comes to Save Us. But, From What?
